titles.title: Identity Theft Victims Protection Act of 2019
Identity Theft Victims Protection Act of 2019
A bill to amend the Fair Credit Reporting Act to accurately report identity theft transactions in the credit histories of criminal defendants.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Identity Theft Victims Protection Act of 2019
This bill requires credit reporting agencies, upon request of a victim of identity theft, to include the resulting negative credit information on the credit report of a defendant found guilty of such identity theft.
